Project.Name: BLE_OTA_External_Memory_Bootloadable
Project.Description: BLE bootloadable example project that receives a firmware image over the BLE interface and stores it (and encrypt it if required) in the external memory location (EEPROM or FRAM). The new image is written to PSoC 4 BLE/PRoC BLE device flash by invoking the external memory bootloader. This project is not a standalone project; it works in conjunction with the external memory bootloader project.
